arma_base.hpp File Reference

Classes

struct  arma_base< elem_type, arma_derived >
 Class for static polymorphism, modelled after the "Curiously Recurring Template Pattern" (CRTP). Used for type-safe downcasting in functions that restrict their input(s) to be classes that are derived from arma_base (e.g. basic_mat, op_data, glue_data, diagview, subview). An arma_base object can be converted to a basic_mat object by the unwrap class. More...
struct  arma_base_vec< elem_type, arma_derived_vec >
